); } } const Comment = styled.div` /* Removes the default 20px margin and creates some padding space for the indicators and controls */ .carousel { margin-bottom: 0; padding: 0 40px 30px 40px; } /* Reposition the controls slightly */ .carousel-control { left: -12px; } .carousel-control.right { right: -12px; } /* Changes the position of the indicators */ .carousel-indicators { right: 50%; top: auto; bottom: 0px; margin-right: -19px; } /* Changes the colour of the indicators */ .carousel-indicators li { background: #c0c0c0; } .carousel-indicators .active { background: #333333; } `; export default Comments;
